participant_1.name: Lena Schmidt
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, Lena enjoys trying new experiences and is passionate about healthy living.
participant_1.background: hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i do like watching cooking shows. i am a vegan and i love hummus.
